author: Cedric
content: Reading some of the stuff being said on Jobs it would seem that every Apple product was invented, designed, built and marketed by him. If that was true than one would think that Apple is doomed. Of course I'm sure it's not and perhaps now we might get to know a little more about some of the creative geniuses who live in Cupertino. Unless of course, it really was all him ðŸ™‚
